description: (June 23, 2009)Behold smoother, bolder, more breathtaking full HD 1080p images and advanced connectivity options right on the LN40B750. And now, you can also get movies on demand via blockbuster and Amazon Instant Video.COMMENT: ==========================================COMMENT: ==========================================Which Size HDTV is Right for My Room?With standard-definition TVs, the rule used to be that viewers would feel comfortable watching a set from a distance of 3 to 6 times the screen size in inches. With HDTV, the resolution is so much better that you can sit closer to a larger TV without noticing the pixels. So with HDTVs, the rule tends to be you can sit anywhere from 1.5 to 3 times the screen size (in inches) for the best experience.
